name: JSON Formatter
description: Formats, beautifies, and minifies data in JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) format, making it easier to read, edit, and debug.

name: CSV to JSON Converter
description: Converts tabular data in CSV (Comma Separated Values) format to the hierarchical structure of JSON (JavaScript Object Notation), ideal for integrating data into web applications and APIs.

name: JSON/YAML Converter
description: Enables bidirectional conversion between JSON and YAML (YAML Ain't Markup Language) data serialization formats, offering flexibility in managing configuration files and data.

name: Base64 Encoder/Decoder
description: Encodes text to Base64 format, an ASCII representation of binary data, and vice versa, useful for transmitting data over mediums that only support text.

name: Timestamp Converter
description: Converts between numeric timestamps and human-readable dates, facilitating the understanding and manipulation of time records in computer systems.

name: JWT Decoder
description: Decodes and inspects the content of JSON Web Tokens (JWTs), a standard for securely transmitting information between parties as a signed JSON object.

name: Token Generator
description: Generates secure random tokens, useful for various applications such as temporary passwords, API keys, or unique identifiers.

name: Color Converter
description: Converts colors between different formats (e.g., HEX, RGB, HSL), enabling designers and developers to work with color values in their preferred format.

name: Base64 to Image Converter
description: Decodes Base64 encoded strings to visualize the resulting image online, useful for working with data URLs, embedded images, and transferring image data as text.

name: Image Color Picker
description: Extract colors from any image online. Simply upload an image or provide a URL to instantly get the HEX, RGB, and HSL color codes of any pixel you select.
